Reviews.Title: Lg Phoenix review
Reviews.Author: Lavalamp "LaVa"
Reviews.Content: Ive had this phone for over a year now so I think this is a good time to write a full review. This will cover basically nothing about the Android UI. The thing about the phone that is absolutely killing me is the memory on it. It came with a microSD card which is great, but i seriously doubt I will ever fill it up because very very very few apps actually are transferable to the SD card. Which brings me to a serious problem. The internal memory is garbage. The only things i have on the internal memory are: Twitter, Facebook, Text messaging, an Alarm clock, a calculator, and a backup tool. I am constantly having to clear the memory or temporally delete these few applications otherwise I can't even receive any incoming texts, emails, tweets, etc.. Other than this serious issue the phone is very good. The screen does not scratch easily. It has a very good size and feels good in my hand. The Phoenix has also shown to be extremely durable, I've dropped it a few dozen times and it hasn't broken or chipped in anyway. All in all a solid entry level smartphone for those who can find a solution to the memory issue.

Reviews.Title: Good starter phone but memory lacking...
Reviews.Author: Ed Sanders
Reviews.Content: This is a good elementary phone for someone just starting but it has little memory free needed to run apps, it's a nuisance and you have to uninstall apps all the time there is room for only one or two downloaded apps, get the amazon app store and there is even less.  Sometimes the keyboard doesn't type what you input and the phone freezes sometimes...

Reviews.Title: I got it for ATT
Reviews.Author: JustSomeFella
Reviews.Content: Pros:Its a great phone and I added to an existing plan without adding a data package.  Phone works fine with Wifi and Bluetooth.Cons:To get or send photos via MMS you must turn on the phones data ( you can't use Wifi for that ).

Reviews.Title: recieved item
Reviews.Author: none
Reviews.Content: this phone is great for the price my wife loves it thank you so much. It has a 122 page book that can be printed or just read it off the computer.

Reviews.Title: I hate this stupid phone.
Reviews.Author: tehya
Reviews.Content: Cons: If you like things that freeze constantly buy a box of freeze pops and save some money. If you want something that resets all the time bash your head in and get a memory disorder because it would be less frustrating than this phone.Pros: It's sort of like time traveling because you're text messaging in the future while your phone is typing words from 30 seconds ago.

Reviews.Title: Would recommend this all the way!
Reviews.Author: jessica
Reviews.Content: My son and I bought one for each of us.......had one before lasted 6 years with no problems ever, dropped it plenty of times, in the water too! Still no problems. I ended up dropping it in a fire, and that ended the phone! That is what made my decision to get it again, love it! Haven't had any problems with my new one either!

Reviews.Title: Good price
Reviews.Author: Wadson Desir
Reviews.Content: It is a good phone for its price range. I think of getting similar phone few weeks from now.Good service overall.

Reviews.Title: Just as advertised
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: Did not have to pay an insurance deductible or extend my contract for 2 additional years, definitely recommend for a replacement.

Reviews.Title: ....Eh
Reviews.Author: Liut
Reviews.Content: When I received the product, the first thing I noticed was the color. The phone was supposed to be dark blue, but it was silver. I'm not complaining, but it was just something I noticed. When I put the straight talk sim card in, the notification bar told me that the network was locked; I immediately freaked out. I contacted the seller and told them my situation, and told me I could get a refund, as the product was defective. Long story short, I called AT&T; and got the Unlock code. Three stars because the phone was, in fact, not unlocked.

Reviews.Title: Lg p-505
Reviews.Author: jessica jones
Reviews.Content: I purchase a phone in March in by December the phone messed up and the screen went black I love the phone to it  did that!

Reviews.Title: LG-P505
Reviews.Author: John A. Gazarkiewicz
Reviews.Content: I got mine free from AT&T;, no wonder why they are free, they are junk, maybe good for a kid, but not for an adult, doesn't hold many apps. Also text messaging is messed up in it, tells me text messages are full, when I delete all of them, a message comes and still say's full, I ordered an iPhone 3 off Ebay, sim card out of P505 will work in it, but not in iPhone 4 or 5...
